definition: understood by everyone (idiom); well known/a household name
lit. Sima Zhao's intentions are obvious to everyone (idiom)/fig. an open secret
pinyin: Si1 ma3 Zhao1 zhi1 xin1 lu4 ren2 jie1 zhi1

sentences.english: Actually that thinly veiled propaganda was in yesterdays article.
sentences.chinese: 事实上这个路人皆知的宣传在昨天的文章中就有了。

sentences.english: His ambition to seize power is known to all.
sentences.chinese: 他冀图夺取政权的野心已经路人皆知了。

sentences.english: Weaknesses in funding and business models have been laid horribly bare.
sentences.chinese: 资金急缺和商业模型疲软早已成了路人皆知的事实。

sentences.english: Everybody knows that children need parenting.
sentences.chinese: 孩子需要父母的呵护，路人皆知。

definition: see 盡人皆知|尽人皆知[jin4 ren2 jie1 zhi1]
known by everyone (idiom); well known/a household name
lit. Sima Zhao's intentions are obvious to everyone (idiom)/fig. an open secret
pinyin: Si1 ma3 Zhao1 zhi1 xin1 lu4 ren2 jie1 zhi1

definition: lit. wind and rain sweeping through the town (idiom)/fig. a big scandal/an uproar/the talk of the town
ambition of wild wolves (idiom); rapacious designs
see 冒大不韙|冒大不韪[mao4 da4 bu4 wei3]
pinyin: mao4 tian1 xia4 zhi1 da4 bu4 wei3

definition: to covet/to long for/to lust after
